name: Fireball
description: A powerful attack.

name: Thorn spike
description: A basic attack.

name: Ice beam
description: 20% chance to Freeze the enemy.

name: Gamble
description: The next 2 moves your opponent uses have 50 accuracy.

name: Wonder Room
description: All Equipment, Move effects, and Status effects are permanently nullified, and no new ones can take effect.

name: Natural Healing
description: Heal damage to yourself as opposed to dealing damage to the opponent.

name: Candle Fire
description: Reliable damage.

name: Blue Room
description: Blue moves have 50% more Power. Does not stack with other Blue Room uses.

name: Flash Fire
description: Power is increased by Speed.

name: Garden
description: Heal over time for the next 4 turns.

name: Life Fire
description: Heal half the damage dealt.

name: Lullaby
description: Make the opponent fall asleep.

name: Fire Field
description: 50% chance to inflict Burn.

name: Downstream
description: Your moves do 30% more damage.

name: Chilling Waters
description: Guarenteed to Freeze opponents whose highest color isn't Blue.

name: Aim
description: Your next move has 100 accuracy.

name: Grass Hammer
description: Big damage.

name: Cresting Slam
description: Big damage.

name: Inferno
description: Insane damage.

name: Hot Spring
description: Heal damage to yourself as opposed to dealing damage to the opponent.

name: Professional Healing
description: Heal damage to yourself as opposed to dealing damage to the opponent.

name: Red Mist
description: Take 30% less damage from Red moves. Does not stack with other Red Mist.

name: Blue Mist
description: Take 30% less damage from Blue moves. Does not stack with other Blue Mist.

name: Green Mist
description: Take 30% less damage from Green moves. Does not stack with other Green Mist.

name: Fiery Punch
description: The opponent's next move has 20 less accuracy.

name: Fiery Tackle
description: The opponent's next move has 20 more accuracy.

name: Calming Meadow
description: The opponent falls asleep after their next turn.

name: Scalding Waters
description: 30% chance to Burn.

name: Red Slam
description: Some reliable Red damage.

name: Green Slam

name: Blue Slam
description: Some reliable Blue damage.

name: Forest Fire
description: Has triple Power and 100 Accuracy when Burned.

name: Reckless Flames
description: Burn both you and the opponent.

name: Building Tide
description: Every time this move is used successfully, its Power is increased by 20.

name: Daydream
description: Heal as opposed to doing damage. Using this move prevents being put to sleep.

name: Preserving Frost
description: Heal as opposed to doing damage. Heal triple when Frozen.

name: Thawing Rage
description: Removes Freeze.

name: Fire Frenzy
description: Removes you red color's move power bonus for the rest of the battle.

name: Red Roots
description: Opponent's Red moves have 20% less Power.

name: Blue Roots

name: Green Roots

name: Storm
description: After every turn, both players take their Red color stat in damage.
